members.name: Client.postMessage()
members.description: Allows a service worker to send a message to a ServiceWorkerClient.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message to send to the service worker.

parameters.name: transfer Optional
parameters.description: A transferable object such as, for example, a reference to a port.

members.name: Client.frameType
members.description: Indicates the type of browsing context of the current client. This value can be one of auxiliary, top-level, nested, or none.

members.name: Client.id
members.description: Returns the universally unique identifier of the Client object.

members.name: Client.type
members.description: Indicates the type of client the service worker is controlling. Its value can be window, worker, sharedworker, or all.

members.name: Client.url
members.description: The URL of the current service worker client.
